#Make plot with ggplot, shows Heterozygosity across all the groups using the newly merged file
```{r}
Heterozygosity_Across_Groups <- (ggplot(raw_data, aes(x = raw_data$Chr_Position, fill = Mid_Moist)) +
  geom_bar(position = "fill") +
  labs(x = "Group", y = "Proportion") +
  theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90)) +
  ggtitle("Heterozygosity for all Groups") +
  theme(plot.title = element_text(hjust = 0.5)))

print(Heterozygosity_Across_Groups)
pdf("Plots/Heterozygosity_Across_Groups.pdf")
print(Heterozygosity_Across_Groups)
```
